source/include/boost/config/compiler/gcc.hpp

00014 //  GNU C++ compiler setup:
00015 
00016 #   if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ == 91
00017        // egcs 1.1 won't parse shared_ptr.hpp without this:
00018 #      define BOOST_NO_AUTO_PTR
00019 #   endif
00020 #   if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 95
00021       //
00022       // Prior to gcc 2.95 member templates only partly
00023       // work - define BOOST_MSVC6_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00024       // instead since inline member templates mostly work.
00025       //
00026 #     define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00027 #     if __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 9
00028 #       define BOOST_MSVC6_MEMBER_TEMPLATES
00029 #     endif
00030 #   endif
00031 
00032 #   if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ < 96
00033 #     define BOOST_NO_SFINAE
00034 #   endif
00035 
00036 #   if __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ <= 97
00037 #     define BOOST_NO_MEMBER_TEMPLATE_FRIENDS
00038 #     define BOOST_NO_OPERATORS_IN_NAMESPACE
00039 #   endif
00040 
00041 #   if __GNUC__ < 3
00042 #      define BOOST_NO_USING_DECLARATION_OVERLOADS_FROM_TYPENAME_BASE
00043 #      define BOOST_FUNCTION_SCOPE_USING_DECLARATION_BREAKS_ADL
00044 #   endif
00045 
00046 #ifndef __EXCEPTIONS
00047 # define BOOST_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 //
00051 // Bug specific to gcc 3.1 and 3.2:
00052 //
00053 #if (__GNUC__ == 3) && ((__GNUC_MINOR__ == 1) || (__GNUC_MINOR__ == 2))
00054 #  define BOOST_NO_EXPLICIT_FUNCTION_TEMPLATE_ARGUMENTS
00055 #endif
00056 
00057 //
00058 // Threading support: Turn this on unconditionally here (except for
00059 // those platforms where we can know for sure). It will get turned off again
00060 // later if no threading API is detected.
00061 //
00062 #if !defined(__MINGW32__) && !defined(linux) && !defined(__linux) && !defined(__linux__)
00063 # define BOOST_HAS_THREADS
00064 #endif 
00065 
00066 //
00067 // gcc has "long long"
00068 //
00069 #define BOOST_HAS_LONG_LONG
00070 
00071 //
00072 // gcc implements the named return value optimization since version 3.1
00073 //
00074 #if __GNUC__ > 3 || ( __GNUC__ == 3 && __GNUC_MINOR__ >= 1 )
00075 #define BOOST_HAS_NRVO
00076 #endif
00077 
00078 #define BOOST_COMPILER "GNU C++ version " __VERSION__
00079 
00080 //
00081 // versions check:
00082 // we don't know gcc prior to version 2.90:
00083 #if (__GNUC__ == 2) && (__GNUC_MINOR__ < 90)
00084 #  error "Compiler not configured - please reconfigure"
00085 #endif
00086 //
00087 // last known and checked version is 3.4:
00088 #if (__GNUC__ > 3) || ((__GNUC__ == 3) && (__GNUC_MINOR__ > 4))
00089 #  if defined(BOOST_ASSERT_CONFIG)
00090 #     error "Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results"
00091 #  else
00092 //#     warning "Unknown compiler version - please run the configure tests and report the results"
00093 #  endif
00094 #endif
00095
